maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Alright, up to the bridge.
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: OK, on monte sur le pont supérieur.

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Oh yeah. Lea?\. Just a heads up - the captain's kinda grumpy, but don't worry about it.
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Ah oui. Lea ?\. Juste un truc - Le capt'aine n'est pas du genre aimable, mais ne t'inquiète pas pour ça.

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: That's just the way he is.
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Il a toujours été comme ça.

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Well, well... Our endeavor has not been concluded!
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Mais, mais... Notre affaire n'est pas encore terminée !

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: You will not escape our will!
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Tu n'échapperas pas à notre volonté !

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: He already caught up?
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Il nous a déjà rattrapées ?

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Lea, those are high level opponents.
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Lea, ces adversaires ont un niveau élevé.

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Do not fight them. Run to the teleporter!
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: N'essaie pas de les combattre. Court directement vers le téléporteur !

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Alright, you will \c[1]probably just kill them with ease\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Bon, tu vas \c[1]probablement juste les abattre sans problème\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Still, we better get off the ship quickly.
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Mais il faut quand même vite s'échapper du navire.

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Jet will kill me if we remain here any longer.
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Jet va me tuer si on reste ici trop longtemps.

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Yes, Lea.\. Even being \c[1]over-leveled\c[0], you will be better off just running away.
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Oui, Lea.\. Même avec le \c[1]niveau surélevé\c[0] que tu as, tu ferais mieux de t'enfuir d'ici.

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: One moment! Let me add a little shortcut for you!
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Attends un peu ! Laisse-moi ajouter un petit raccourci pour toi !

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: This will take you right to the \c[3]teleporter\c[0], where Carla is waiting.
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Il va t'amener directement au \c[3]téléporteur\c[0], où Carla t'attend.

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: ...How?
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: ... Comment ?

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Hm?
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Hm ?

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Yes, that sure would have helped back then when we had to run through the whole cargo hold, correct?
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Oui, ça aurait pu nous être utile avant, quand il fallait qu'on s'enfuie. C'est ça ?

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: Unfortunately, I did not have the routine to spawn these shortcuts ready back then.
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Malheureusement, je n'avais pas cette routine pour faire apparaitre des raccourcis à l'époque.

maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.orig: To Teleporter
maps/cargo-ship/room-end.json/entities/2.text: Vers le Téléporteur

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/0/se.orig: Amazing work.\. Numbers sure can't beat \c[1]ridiculously high damage... numbers\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/0/se.text: Super boulot.\. La supériorité numérique ne peut rien contre les... \c[1]dégâts numériques ridiculement élevés\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/0/se.orig: Amazing work!\. Numbers sure can't beat skill.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/0/se.text: Bon travail !\. La supériorité numérique ne peut rien contre le vrai talent.
Où \c[1]contre un niveau bien trop élevé\c[0], dans notre cas.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/7/se.orig: Would ya look at all those cowards ganging up on you!
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/7/se.text: Regarde un peu comment ces froussards essaient de t'encercler !
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/7/se.note: de: " wie die Feiglinge dich schon mit acht Mann umzingeln müssen!": comment les mechants doivent déjà avec soin t'encercler

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/7/se.text: Ouais...\. ben ils peuvent toujours essayer...

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/7/se.orig: But don't panic,\. just keep moving and strike fast!
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/7/se.text: Mais ne panique pas,\. Il suffit juste de bouger et de frapper vite !

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/16/s.orig: Aaand another victory for our fearless gladiator Lea!\.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/16/s.text: Eeeet encore une victoire pour Lea notre gladiatrice téméraire !

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/23/s.orig: C'mon, show me a right hook! \.\. And a left!
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/23/s.text: Allez, montre-moi un crochet à droite !\.\. Et à gauche !

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/23/s.orig: Standard VPI was not modeled after boxing\..\..\..
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/23/s.text: Les VPIs standard ne sont pas basés sur la boxe\..\..\..

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/35/s.orig: Nice moves!\. They didn't even see it coming.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/35/s.text: Joli travail !\. Celui-là ils ne l'ont pas vu venir.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/40/s.orig: Yeah yeah I know,\. a second waited is an attack wasted.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/40/s.text: Oui oui, je sais - \.Une seconde gâchée c'est une attaque manquée.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/40/s.orig: Still,\. you should know that your strikes have enough punch to interrupt some attacks.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/40/s.text: Mais tu devrais savoir que tes coups ont assez de force pour interrompre certaines attaques ennemies.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/40/s.orig: So you can just pummel your opponents without giving them a chance to strike back.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/40/s.text: Donc tu peux les défoncer sans qu'ils puissent se défendre.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/40/s.orig: Does this even matter when she defeats everything with a single hit?
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/40/s.text: Est-ce que ça change vraiment quelque chose, quand elle peut tout anéantir en un seul coup ?

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/40/s.orig: Sounds like a plan, am I right?\. So go get 'em!
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/40/s.text: Ça te parait bien ? Alors va les cogner !

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/41/s.orig: Close in fast and whack 'em over the head!
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/41/s.text: Jette-toi sur eux et cabosse-leur la tête !

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/51/s.orig:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/51/s.text:
Mauvaise direction, Lea !\.
Il faut qu'on atteigne le téléporteur !

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.orig: Hey champ, get your adrenaline down again for a second.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.text: Hé championne, attends encore une seconde.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.orig: We gotta add a bit more edge to your arsenal.\.\. A sharp one, that is!
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.text: Le temps est venu d'ajouter un peu de piquant à ton arsenal.\.\. Du genre tranchant !

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.orig: I see that got your attention.\.\. Sergey, you finished?
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.text: Je vois que ça t'intéresse.\.\. Sergey, tu as fini ?

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.orig: Yes.\.\.\. Unlocking Virtual Proximity Impact\..\..\..\. now.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.text: Bieen !\. Avec ces attaques au corps-à-corps...\.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.orig: ...you can quickly tear through several targets in your path at once.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.text: ... tu peux rapidement toucher plusieurs cibles en même temps.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.orig: Only them close ones, \.of course.\. You got that?
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.text: Seulement celles qui sont proches, \.bien sûr.\. T'as compris ?

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.orig: Sharp as a blade!\. Now start by clearing that path for us, will ya?
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.text: T'as l'esprit aussi affuté qu'une lame !\. Maintenant commence par nous frayer un chemin par là.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.orig:
Click \i[throw] near Lea inside the circle to perform a close-combat attack.
Alternatively, just press \i[key-melee].
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.text:
Cliquez sur \i[throw] près de Lea à l'intérieur du cercle pour attaquer au corps-à-corps.
Vous pouvez aussi appuyer sur \i[key-melee].

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.orig:
Press \i[throw] without touching \i[right-stick] to perform a close-combat attack.
Alternatively, just press \i[gamepad-x].
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/61/s.text: Appuyez sur \i[throw] sans toucher a \i[right-stick] pour attaquer au corps-à-corps.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.orig: Just do a few warm-up swings on those pesky obstacles.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.text: Fais juste un peu d'échauffement sur ces satanés obstacles.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.orig: Just do a few warm-up swings on those pesky obstacles.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.text: Fais juste un peu d'échauffement sur ces satanés obstacles.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.orig: Don't worry, those are the same weaklings as before.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, c'est les mêmes gringalets qu'avant.
Il suffit juste de t'énerver sur eux !

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.orig: More punching bags await your blade.
And here we are at the last challenge.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.text: Et nous voici au défi final.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.orig: Don't let the big number scare you and keep focused.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.text: Ne laisse pas les gros chiffres t'impressionner et reste concentré.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/65/s.orig: That was quite the ride, huh?

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.orig: Aaand you just crossed the finish line!\. Congrats!
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.text: Eeeeet tu as franchi la ligne d'arrivée !\. Félicitations !

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.orig: I mean sure...\. with this amount of \c[1]damage\c[0] it's no wonder, but still.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.text: Je veux dire...\. vu les \c[1]dégâts\c[0] que tu fais, ce n'est pas surprenant, mais quand même.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.orig: It's like you've never forgotten the basics at all.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.text: C'est comme si tu n'avais jamais oublié les fondamentaux.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.orig: Oh my, you still look so puzzled about all this.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.text: Hé ben, tu as l'air d'être toujours aussi paumée.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.note: de: "tu as l'air de faire n'importe quoi avec ta lessive" ?

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.orig: I suppose it is about time we explain all the circumstances.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.text: Je pense qu'il est temps que l'on t'explique la situation.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.orig: You bet it is.\. But let's take a short break before that, okay?
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.text: Ça c'est sûr !\. Mais on pourrait pas faire une pause avant ?

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.orig: I still need to report to the captain.\. He wants to meet Lea as well.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.text: Il faut encore que je fasse un rapport au capitaine.\. Il veut voir Lea aussi.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.orig: Good idea.\. Best not keep Jet waiting for too long.
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/68/s.text: Bonne idée.\. C'est mieux de ne pas faire attendre Jet trop longtemps.

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/70/s.orig: We can sense your fear...\. your every step!
maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/70/s.text: Nous pouvons ressentir ta peur...\. et chacun de tes pas !

maps/cargo-ship/room5.json/entities/75/s.orig: What...\. how can you defeat them?!
